name: Todoist Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Todoist Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Todoist API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Todoist API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: apiKey
available_options: API Key (值: apiKey)
OAuth2 (值: oAuth2)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: task | (必填项)
available_options: Task (值: task) - Task resource
Project (值: project) - Project resource
Section (值: section) - Section resource
Comment (值: comment) - Comment resource
Label (值: label) - Label resource
Reminder (值: reminder) - Reminder resource

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create | (必填项)
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a new reminder
Delete (值: delete) - Delete a reminder
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many reminders
Update (值: update) - Update a reminder

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | (必填项)

project.name: project
project.description: The destination project. Choose from the list, or specify an ID.
project.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: The destination project. Choose from the list, or specify an ID. | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

section.name: section
section.description: Section to which you want move the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
section.natural_language_description: 参数名: Section Name or ID | 作用: Section to which you want move the task. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: description (值: None) - A description for the task
dueDateTime (值: None) - Specific date and time in RFC3339 format in UTC
dueLang (值: None) - 2-letter code specifying language in case due_string is not written in English
dueString (值: None) - Human defined task due date (ex.: “next Monday”, “Tomorrow”). Value is set using local (not UTC) time.
parentId (值: None) - The parent task you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
priority (值: None) - Task priority from 1 (normal) to 4 (urgent)
section (值: None) - The section you want to operate on. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
order (值: None) - Non-zero integer used to sort tasks under the same parent
dueDate (值: None) - Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format
assigneeId (值: None) - Responsible user ID (for shared tasks)
duration (值: None) - Positive integer for task duration (must be used with Duration Unit)
durationUnit (值: None) - Unit of time for duration (must be used with Duration)
deadlineDate (值: None) - Specific deadline date in YYYY-MM-DD format

labels.name: labels
labels.description: Optional labels that will be assigned to a created task. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
labels.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label Names | 作用: Optional labels that will be assigned to a created task. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression. | 默认值: []

content.name: content
content.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Task content | (必填项)

text.name: text
text.description: Natural language text for quick adding task (e.g., "Buy milk @Grocery #shopping tomorrow"). It can include a due date in free form text, a project name starting with the "#" character (without spaces), a label starting with the "@" character, an assignee starting with the "+" character, a priority (e.g., p1), a deadline between "{}" (e.g. {in 3 days}), or a description starting from "//" until the end of the text.
text.natural_language_description: 参数名: Text | 作用: Natural language text for quick adding task (e.g., "Buy milk @Grocery #shopping tomorrow"). It can include a due date in free form text, a project name starting with the "#" character (without spaces), a label starting with the "@" character, an assignee starting with the "+" character, a priority (e.g., p1), a deadline between "{}" (e.g. {in 3 days}), or a description starting from "//" until the end of the text. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

filters.name: filters
filters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: filter (值: None) - Filter by any supported filter.
ids (值: None) - A list of the task IDs to retrieve, this should be a comma-separated list
labelId (值: None) - Filter tasks by label. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
lang (值: None) - IETF language tag defining what language filter is written in, if differs from default English
parentId (值: None) - Filter tasks by parent task ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
projectId (值: None) - Filter tasks by project ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
sectionId (值: None) - Filter tasks by section ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: content (值: None) - Task content
description (值: None) - A description for the task
dueDateTime (值: None) - Specific date and time in RFC3339 format in UTC
dueLang (值: None) - 2-letter code specifying language in case due_string is not written in English
dueString (值: None) - Human defined task due date (ex.: “next Monday”, “Tomorrow”). Value is set using local (not UTC) time.
dueLang (值: None) - 2-letter code specifying language in case due_string is not written in English
labels (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
priority (值: None) - Task priority from 1 (normal) to 4 (urgent)
order (值: None) - Non-zero integer used to sort tasks under the same parent
dueDate (值: None) - Specific date in YYYY-MM-DD format
assigneeId (值: None) - Responsible user ID (for shared tasks)
duration (值: None) - Positive integer for task duration (must be used with Duration Unit)
durationUnit (值: None) - Unit of time for duration (must be used with Duration)
deadlineDate (值: None) - Specific deadline date in YYYY-MM-DD format

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: The project ID - can be either a string or number
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project ID | 作用: The project ID - can be either a string or number | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the project | (必填项)

projectOptions.name: projectOptions
projectOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: color (值: None) - The color of the project
is_favorite (值: None) - Whether the project is a favorite
parent_id (值: None) - Parent project ID
view_style (值: None) - The default view style of the project

projectUpdateFields.name: projectUpdateFields
projectUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - Name of the project
color (值: None) - The color of the project
is_favorite (值: None) - Whether the project is a favorite
view_style (值: None) - The default view style of the project

sectionId.name: sectionId
sectionId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Section ID | (必填项)

sectionProject.name: sectionProject
sectionProject.description: The project to add the section to
sectionProject.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project Name or ID | 作用: The project to add the section to | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sectionName.name: sectionName
sectionName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the section | (必填项)

sectionOptions.name: sectionOptions
sectionOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: order (值: None) - The order of the section

sectionUpdateFields.name: sectionUpdateFields
sectionUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - Name of the section

sectionFilters.name: sectionFilters
sectionFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: project_id (值: None) - Filter sections by project. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

commentId.name: commentId
commentId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Comment ID | (必填项)

commentTaskId.name: commentTaskId
commentTaskId.description: The ID of the task to comment on
commentTaskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: The ID of the task to comment on | (必填项)

commentContent.name: commentContent
commentContent.natural_language_description: 参数名: Content | 作用: Comment content | (必填项)

commentUpdateFields.name: commentUpdateFields
commentUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: content (值: None) - Comment content

commentFilters.name: commentFilters
commentFilters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: task_id (值: None) - Filter comments by task ID
project_id (值: None) - Filter comments by project ID

labelId.name: labelId
labelId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Label ID | (必填项)

labelName.name: labelName
labelName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of the label | (必填项)

labelOptions.name: labelOptions
labelOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: color (值: None) - The color of the label
order (值: None) - Label order
is_favorite (值: None) - Whether the label is a favorite

labelUpdateFields.name: labelUpdateFields
labelUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: name (值: None) - Name of the label
color (值: None) - The color of the label
order (值: None) - Label order
is_favorite (值: None) - Whether the label is a favorite

reminderId.name: reminderId
reminderId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Reminder ID | (必填项)

itemId.name: itemId
itemId.description: The ID of the task to attach reminder to
itemId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: The ID of the task to attach reminder to | (必填项)

dueDateType.name: dueDateType
dueDateType.description: How to specify when the reminder should trigger
dueDateType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Due Date Type | 作用: How to specify when the reminder should trigger | 默认值: natural_language | (必填项)
available_options: Natural Language (值: natural_language) - Human-readable date and time (e.g., "tomorrow 2pm")
Full-Day Date (值: full_day) - Date without specific time (floating)
Floating Date with Time (值: floating_time) - Date and time without timezone
Fixed Timezone Date with Time (值: fixed_timezone) - Date and time with specific timezone

natural_language_representation.name: natural_language_representation
natural_language_representation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Natural Language Representation | 作用: Human-readable date and time | (必填项)

date.name: date
date.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date | 作用: Full-day date in YYYY-MM-DD format | (必填项)

datetime.name: datetime
datetime.natural_language_description: 参数名: Date Time | 作用: Date and time with timezone | (必填项)

timezone.name: timezone
timezone.description: Timezone for the fixed timezone date
timezone.natural_language_description: 参数名: Timezone | 作用: Timezone for the fixed timezone date | (必填项)

reminderOptions.name: reminderOptions
reminderOptions.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: type (值: None) - The reminder type
minute_offset (值: None) - Minutes before the task due date
notify_uid (值: None) - User ID to notify (for shared tasks)

reminderUpdateFields.name: reminderUpdateFields
reminderUpdateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: due (值: None) - When the reminder should trigger
type (值: None) - The reminder type
minute_offset (值: None) - Minutes before the task due date
notify_uid (值: None) - User ID to notify (for shared tasks)
